const common_1 = require("@nestjs/common");
const typeorm_1 = require("@nestjs/typeorm");
const typeorm_2 = require("typeorm");
const comment_entity_1 = require("./entities/comment.entity");
const comment_images_service_1 = require("../comment-images/comment-images.service");
const articles_service_1 = require("../articles/articles.service");
let CommentsService = class CommentsService {
    constructor(commentRepository, articleService, commentImagesService) {
        this.commentRepository = commentRepository;
        this.articleService = articleService;
        this.commentImagesService = commentImagesService;
    }
    async create(createCommentDto, file) {
        const targetArticle = await this.articleService.findOne(createCommentDto.articleId);
        if (!targetArticle) {
            throw new common_1.HttpException({
                status: common_1.HttpStatus.UNPROCESSABLE_ENTITY,
                errors: {
                    message: '해당 게시글이 존재하지 않습니다.',
                },
            }, common_1.HttpStatus.UNPROCESSABLE_ENTITY);
        }
        const createCommentResult = await this.commentRepository.save(this.commentRepository.create(createCommentDto));
        if (file) {
            const createCommentImageDto = {
                commentId: createCommentResult.id,
                url: file.location,
            };
            await this.commentImagesService.create(createCommentImageDto);
        }
        return createCommentResult;
    }
    findByArticleId(articleId, paginationOptions) {
        return this.commentRepository
            .createQueryBuilder('comment')
            .where('comment.articleId = :id', { id: articleId })
            .leftJoin('comment.user', 'user')
            .leftJoin('comment.images', 'image')
            .select([
            'comment.id',
            'comment.content',
            'comment.createdAt',
            'user.id',
            'user.nickname',
            'user.profileImg',
            'image.url',
        ])
            .limit(paginationOptions.limit)
            .offset(paginationOptions.limit * (paginationOptions.page - 1))
            .getMany();
    }
    findAll(articleId) {
        return this.commentRepository.find();
    }
    findOne(id) {
        return this.commentRepository.findOne({ where: { id: id } });
    }
    update(id, updateCommentDto) {
        return this.commentRepository.save(this.commentRepository.create(Object.assign({ id }, updateCommentDto)));
    }
    remove(id) {
        return this.commentRepository.softDelete({ id });
    }
};
CommentsService = __decorate([
    (0, common_1.Injectable)(),
    __param(0, (0, typeorm_1.InjectRepository)(comment_entity_1.Comment)),
    __metadata("design:paramtypes", [typeorm_2.Repository,

        comment_images_service_1.CommentImagesService])
], CommentsService);
exports.CommentsService = CommentsService;
